radiographic_examinations.findings: Normal cardiac silhouette; no consolidations or pleural effusions.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: CT scan of the tibia, fibula, and foot
radiographic_examinations.findings: Normal osseous structures without fractures or cortical erosions; diffuse nonspecific edema of the soft tissues of the ankle and proximal dorsal foot without abscesses or deep fascial thickening.
Leukocytoclastic vasculitis confirmed by hematoxylin and eosin staining; immunofluorescence revealed positive granular perivascular immunoreactivity for IgA, C3, and fibrin.
